title: Chris Hayes | CNN’s Democratic Debate, Night Two: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the second night of the second Democratic presidential debate of the 2020 election.

Then, Chris Hayes talks about night two of the second Democratic debates and the issue of electability.

Chris also takes a few more questions just for this podcast.
